title: The Blessed event: quandary
brief_description: A married woman is upset when she discovers she is pregnant. She has just returned to work and doesn’t want a second child. Her quandary is about telling her husband, who is against abortion. This program will be of interest to a wide range of people, as well as educators, counsellors, community health and women’s organisations and marriage counselling services.
